member.name: M:TaskHub.API.Controllers.TaskItemsController.GetTaskItems
member.summary: Retrieves all task items from the data source.
member.remarks: This method performs an asynchronous operation to fetch all task items from the underlying data source. The returned collection will be empty if no task items are found.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains an with an of objects representing the retrieved task items.
